items.projectDescription: USB port isolator based on an Analog Devices ADuM3160 to protect computers against over-voltage spikes, ESD pulses and to avoid ground loops.

items.projectName: USBtinyISP AVR Programmer Kit (USB SpokePOV Dongle)
items.projectDescription: USBtinyISP is a simple open-source USB AVR programmer and SPI interface. It is low cost, easy to make, works great with avrdude, has both 6 and 10 pin standard ISP cables, is AVRStudio-compatible and tested under Windows XP and MacOS X, it may or may not work with your specific Vista/Windows 7 system, please visit the Adafruit forums before purchase. Click the link labeled 'Project Website' to find out more.
projectKeywords: USBtinyISP AVR Programmer Kit (USB SpokePOV Dongle)

items.projectDescription: A portable, rechargeable theremin using ultrasonic transducers for distance sensing. Connect the device to any consumer-grade speaker or directly to your computer to record your sound!
The Ultra-WideBand Feather incorporates the Decawave DWM1000 module and an ATSAMD21 ARM Cortex M0 into the Adafruit feather form-factor for projects requiring localization or wireless distancing.
Mini-ITX case designed to be easily manufactured and modified. Almost all components are off-the-shelf and panels are sheet material or easily 3D-printed.

This project was designed as a final course project applying IoT (Internet of Things), where we can obtain environmental variables such as: ambient temperature, ambient humidity, pressure and an approximation of altitude monitoring all these values in real time through Node-RED.

The VCNL4010 is designed for measuring short distances, no more than 200mm and under our experimentation we found it worked best at distances of about 10-150mm. It would be good for detecting when a hand moved nearby, or before a robot smacks into a wall. The sensor also has an ambient light sensor. This sensor is easy to use with any microcontroller that has i2c capability. You can use it with 3.3V or 5V logic with no risk of damage.  Click the link labeled 'Project Website' to find out more.
Breakout with Vishay VEML6030 light sensor
Breakout with Vishay VEML6070 UV light sensor
Breakout with Vishay VEML7700 light sensor

A clock that displays time on a VGA monitor.
The chip that keeps time and creates the display signal is an open source ASIC from the Google/Efabless/Skywater MPW1 shuttle.
PCB to breakout the pins of a panel-mount VGA connector to easy-to-use solder pads.

The Vinduino R3 board contains all the electronics needed for a solar powered remote sensor platform. It is designed for optimizing agricultural irrigation, aimed at increasing crop yield and saving irrigation water. This board represents the 3rd generation design of our remote sensor platform, and has gone through extensive agriculture field trials.

items.projectName: VS1053 Codec + MicroSD Breakout - MP3/WAV/MIDI/OGG Play + Record - v4
items.projectDescription: The VS1053 can decode a wide variety of audio formats such as MP3, AAC, Ogg Vorbis, WMA, MIDI, FLAC, WAV (PCM and ADPCM). It can also be used to record audio in both PCM (WAV) and compressed Ogg Vorbis. You can do all sorts of stuff with the audio as well such as adjusting bass, treble, and volume digitally. There is also 8 GPIO pins that can be used for stuff like lighting up small LEDs or reading buttons. Click the link labeled 'Project Website' to find out more.
projectKeywords: VS1053 Codec + MicroSD Breakout - MP3/WAV/MIDI/OGG Play + Record

items.projectDescription: Hose collar for output of a diesel water pump (3‚Äù OD)
Threaded cap for output of a diesel water pump (1" OD)
Tightens interlocking threaded collars onto a a water input hose for a compressor
Joins flanged pipe (not pressurized)
Attaches and seals a hose onto a fitting
Joins three flexible pipe (silicone/PVC with ID 4-7mm)
Water tight seal for a 1/2" BSP fitting
Soap used to incentivize hand washing, featuring a plastic toy on the inside. The more you wash the closer you are to reaching the toy.
20.5/16.5 straight coupler used to join to pipes.
DIN ISO 228 (DIN 259) BSP Standard Pipe Thread 11mm
DIN ISO 228 (DIN 259) BSP Standard Pipe Thread 13mm
DIN ISO 228 (DIN 259) BSP Standard Pipe Thread 16mm
DIN ISO 228 (DIN 259) BSP Standard Pipe Thread 20mm
Eurorack Gesture Controller
Ultralight bug protection for hammocks intended primarily for backpacking and camping. This bug net system fits over the entire hammock and user and measures 110 in by 51 in.
Open Source EV charger.
Watchy - Open Source E-Paper Watch

The Water Holdup Probe is a device which enables the real-time measurement  of water level in flowing pipes for flow loop research projects, its Arduino board allows the Plug And Play feature with a direct connection to computer and real-time monitoring and data storage using Arduino open source software.
Wattuino Nanite 841 is an Arduino compatible microcontroller board with Microchip AVR ATtiny841 microcontroller with Micronucleus USB bootloader
Wattuino Nanite 85 is an Arduino compatible microcontroller board with Microchip AVR ATtiny85 microcontroller with Micronucleus USB bootloader
Wattuino Pro Mini are Arduino Pro Mini compatible microcontroller boards
Wattuino Pro Mini PB is an Arduino Pro Mini compatible microcontroller board
Wattuino Uno is an Arduino Uno compatible microcontroller board.

The WAV Trigger is a unique high-fidelity polyphonic audio player with surprising capabilities. Supporting up to 2048 uncompressed 16-bit, 44.1kHz wav files ‚Äì the same quality as an audio CD ‚Äì the WAV Trigger can play and mix up to 14 stereo tracks simultaneously and independently, with very low latency. Tracks can be controlled via 16 programmable trigger inputs, or by using a native serial control protocol or even MIDI.

waveConnect is an IoT development board based on LoRa-E5 from Seeedstudio. With a built-in QWIIC connector, the board gives the flexibility to connect with plenty of i2c sensors from environment monitoring to ToF. The design also has a Solar Energy harvesting IC from e-Peas which makes it sustainable.
A device to easily toggle Atlas Scientific EZO Circuits between UART and I2C mode.
An Arduino Shield to connect sensors and devices from Atlas Scientific
WiFi-Bee is a WiFi/WLAN module with Microchip ATWINC1500 WiFi Network Controller
A Eurorack-format simple sampler in a silly package. It runs CircuitPython for lots of customization possibilities.
Sol is a Eurorack USB MIDI to CV/Gate module. It is the first module that runs CircuitPython, which allows users to deeply customize the module's behavior using just a text editor.

items.projectName: Wireless Camera Imaging System for Centrifugal Microfluidic Discs
items.projectDescription: This standalone imaging system employs a generic low-cost wireless camera to view and record videos of centrifugal microfluidic discs. It is fabricated using 3D printers and a low-cost CNC machine and is controlled by an Arduino Uno. The device easily enables flow-visualisation of 'on-disc' liquids which is highly beneficial when troubleshooting dysfunctional fluidic structures during disc development. Moreover, stable real-time colourimetric measurements of 'on-disc' liquids can be acquired.
The XBee-USB-Adapter is an USB to serial adapter and breakout for XBee modules.

A placa XPboard ela foi desenvolvida pensando na cria√ß√£o de um sistema embarcado chamado XPsys para o ESP32 utilizando a interface gr√°fica do ST7920, eu mesmo projetei no Software Eagle para utilizar com o Doit ESP32 DevKit v1.

The XPboard board was developed thinking of creating an embedded system called XPsys for ESP32 using the graphical interface of the ST7920, I even designed it in the Eagle Software for use with Doit ESP32 DevKit v1.

If you enjoy hiking or camping, or simply want an easy way to monitor your environment on the go, then the Xpedit could be just what you need. It uses a BME280 sensor to detect temperature, humidity, air pressure, and altitude, all of which are fed to an ATmega328P microcontroller that runs the device.

YaDRV Yet Another stepper driver board, allow you to use it as stepper driver or as development board for some custom project, where stepper are involved.
Source code for onboard MCU located at ttps://github.com/alexgubanow/yadrv
For schematic and pcb, pls look at https://easyeda.com/alexgubanow/yadrv

YARD Stick One (Yet Another Radio Dongle) can transmit or receive digital wireless signals at frequencies below 1 GHz. It uses the same radio circuit as the popular IM-Me. YARD Stick One features half-duplex transmit and receive in ASK, OOK, GFSK, 2-FSK, 4-FSK, MSK modulations with data rates up to 500 kbps.

The flight controller based with Ardupilot project for drone on 64bit ARM Linux. The schematic and the PCB layout were all done with Kicad. It is meant to be a DIY electronics engineering development.
Storage cube for yellow small parts organizers.

Z80-512K is an RC2014-compatible CPU and memory module. It includes Z80 CPU, 512 KB of Flash ROM, 512 KB of battery-backed SRAM, CPLD-based memory paging logic and UART clock divider, and a CPU supervisor.

Z80-512K is an RC2014-compatible CPU and memory module. It includes Z80 CPU, 512 KB of Flash ROM, 512 KB of battery-backed SRAM, CPLD-based memory paging logic and UART clock divider, and a CPU supervisor.
Open Source CC2652P LAN ZigBee 3.x Coordinator

Zigbee Coordinator based on TI CC2652P chip what have 20 dbm amplifier for a good range and enough memory for stability.
Zigbee Stick have BSL,RST Buttons,2 LED for indication.
Its compatible with opensource project Z2M
SMA antenna port for an external antenna
Self-programming via the cc2538-bsl .No external programmer needed! 
Communicates via the common CH340E/CH340C USB-UART Bridge

ZigUNO is a development board for creating DIY Zigbee devices based on Ebyte E18-MS1 module (CC2530)

Physically, the board is compatible with all shields of the Uno form factor. Finally you can use countless old Arduino shields ü§£

As a firmware, it is proposed to use:

Zigbee configurable firmware PTVO
Develop custom one using DIYRuZ projects as examples

The ZTO-80 SBC is a Z80 Single Board Computer (SBC) packed with hardware and software features.
The ZTO-80 Modular System is a modular Z80 computer system consisting of a backplane and modules that perform different functions.

The ZX Sensor works by bouncing infrared (IR) beams of light from the two LEDs on either side off of an object above the sensor. The bounced light returns to the receiver in the center of the sensor, and a microcontroller on the back of the sensor interprets the data. With these IR pieces you will easily be able to ascertain both the Z axis and the X axis of an object (hence the name).

items.projectName: Œº3D: RatRig V-Core 3 EVA 2 wiring over RJ45
items.projectDescription: This PCB is designed specifically as an addon for the EVA 2 3D project. Rather than wiring all devices directly from the 3D printer electronics panel to the hotend assembly, this PCB allows you to connect two simple RJ45 wires between the boards, and then wire the devices directly using the JST-XH connectors. One PCB mounts to the hotend, the other mounts on the electronics panel. It then makes it simple to swap out a hotend without rewiring everything.
ŒºBraids SE is a voltage-controlled digital oscillator/‚Äãsound source in 8HP with a wide range of creative and useful sound generation algorithms (aka models).
ŒºClouds SE is a granular audio processor that creates textures and soundscapes by combining multiple segments of sound taken from a recording buffer.

ŒºDiff: Power+Data to LEDs and devices over RJ45
A simple 50mmx44mm module to route power and differential signals (RS-485) over RJ-45. It uses RS-485 differential signaling and 802.3af mode B pinouts to achieve this. The ŒºDiff module can accept an input voltage between 8V-28V, and provides outputs of 5V and 3.3V. Both output voltages, GND, along with the RO, RE, DI, RE signals can be accessed through an 8-pin header.

ŒºPow: 3D printer buck converter for 12V/5V fans
A dual-output switching DC-DC buck converter to replace the 24V fans on a 3D printer.
ŒºRings SE is a resonator, transforming unpitched external excitation signals into pitched sounds by modeling the vibrations of bars, tubes, and strings.

ŒºSMU is a small USB-powered 4-quadrant source-measure unit with a footprint smaller than a credit card. It can be used for low-cost semiconductor characterisation such as for solar cells, photodiodes, transistors and diodes
